segments.text: Take me to this address , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much do I owe you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you kidding ? The meter says 15 dollars , doesn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but we need some extra charge and some tip too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't get it . I'll go and have our doorman talk to you then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , Ma'am . Calm down , 15 dollars will do .
segments.speaker: S2
